title: Deputies may serve
context: §803-35 Deputies may serve. If the search warrant is directed to a sheriff or chief of police, it may be executed by the sheriff or chief of police or any of the sheriff&rsquo;s or chief&rsquo;s deputies. [PC 1869, c 48, §6; RL 1925, §3963; RL 1935, §5415; RL 1945, §10720; RL 1955, §255-20; HRS §708-35; ren L 1972, c 9, pt of §1; gen ch 1985; am L 1989, c 211, §10; am L 1990, c 281, §11]
